body: @xtqqczze you may want to update the PR description with your reasoning for each change, since most of them seem to be on a per-class basis. I'd also recommend a more general PR title, since it seems you're not only adding `static` modifiers here, so it's probably a little less confusing to use something like `Update class modifiers` and explain static / sealed / etc for each class you're changing in the PR description. ðŸ™‚
